db:abstract.db:para: The QSupportedWritingSystems class is used when registering fonts with the internal Qt fontdatabase.

db:listitem.db:para: QSupportedWritingSystems is part of Painting Classes

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Its to provide an easy to use interface for indicating what writing systems a specific font supports.

db:section.db:title: QSupportedWritingSystems::QSupportedWritingSystems()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new object to handle supported writing systems.

db:section.db:title: QSupportedWritingSystems::QSupportedWritingSystems(const QSupportedWritingSystems &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other writing systems object.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QSupportedWritingSystems::~QSupportedWritingSystems()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the supported writing systems object.

db:section.db:title: void QSupportedWritingSystems::setSupported(QFontDatabase::WritingSystem writingSystem, bool support = true)
db:section.db:para: Sets or clears support for the specified writingSystem based on the value given by support.

db:section.db:title: bool QSupportedWritingSystems::supported(QFontDatabase::WritingSystem writingSystem) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the writing system specified by writingSystem is supported; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QSupportedWritingSystems &QSupportedWritingSystems::operator=(const QSupportedWritingSystems &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of the other writing systems object.
